subject: Football Association Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Wigan Athletic's coach is Roberto Martínez, a Spaniard, and his ability to coach and coax stylish soccer out of often-discarded individuals has attracted the attention of bigger clubs.
snippet: Wigan Athletic's coach is Roberto Martínez, a Spaniard, and his ability to coach and coax stylish soccer out of often-discarded individuals has attracted the attention of bigger clubs.
